review: It's a very simple and relatively cheap product. I've bought one just to try out and I was surprised at how easy it is to set it up and have it running. It is true there are only a few apps that can be used with Chromecast, but it works with Netflix and Youtube, so if you use those, this item is for you. I believe more apps are probably going to support it if its sales rise. But nonetheless it is a very good replacement for the more expensive Apple TV (which I also own), if you target Netflix. And it presents no difficulties to be controlled by your smartphone or tablet (including IOS devices). Its size is also well thought, as you can hide it behind your TV and no one will ever notice you have it there. That's it: simple, easy and affordable.
